column1: #: description: $D^0$ $R_{AA}$ in Au+Au collisions at $\sqrt{s_{NN}} =200$ GeV for $0-10\%$ (a)
column3: respectively. The first two and last two data points are presented as empty circles
column4: indicating that the p+p reference is extrapolated into these $p_T$ ranges. The statistical and systematic uncertainties are shown as error bars and brackets on the data points. The light and dark green boxes on the right depict the normalization uncertainties in determining the $N_{bin}$ in Au+Au collisions and the total inelastic cross section in p+p collisions

column1: #: keyword reactions: AU AU --> NEUTRAL X
